org.apache.kudu.client

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kudu.client.KuduRpc<OperationResponse>
      • org.apache.kudu.client.Operation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Delete, Insert, Update, Upsert

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public abstract class Operation
extends org.apache.kudu.client.KuduRpc<OperationResponse>
    Base class for the RPCs that related to WriteRequestPB. It contains almost all the logic and knows how to serialize its child classes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.kudu.client.KuduRpc

        externalConsistencyMode, MASTER_SERVICE_NAME, MAX_TRACES_SIZE, propagatedTimestamp, TABLET_SERVER_SERVICE_NAME

      Returns the partition key this RPC is for, or null if the RPC is not tablet specific.

      • partitionKey

        public byte[] partitionKey()
        Description copied from class: org.apache.kudu.client.KuduRpc
